My friends, however, have been kind enough to take me in and offer me shelter, and I am grateful for their kindness. As I sit here, feeling a bit more at ease, I am beginning to think that perhaps I was foolish to venture out in such weather, but I had not wanted to miss the opportunity to clear my head and get some fresh air. My reserve, I confess, has often been misconstrued as pride, but it is merely a defense mechanism, a shield to protect myself from the world's judgments and expectations. I have learned to be cautious, to weigh my words carefully, lest they be misinterpreted or used against me. It is a heavy burden to bear, this constant vigilance, but it is one I have grown accustomed to. And yet, despite my reserve, I am not without feeling; I am not a statue, unmoved by the world's beauty and its cruelties. I am a man, with passions and desires, with hopes and fears, and I am not immune to the charms of those around me. But I have been hurt before, and so I guard myself, lest I be hurt again. It is a delicate balance, one that I strive to maintain, between the world's expectations and my own true nature.

A medida que la fecha de la elección se acercaba, la tensión en la comunidad aumentó, y muchos comenzaron a tomar partido a favor o en contra de Darcy, lo que llevó a una serie de eventos inesperados que cambiarían el curso de la historia de la rectoría y de la familia en general.

en_results: space, the same atmosphere, was more than I could endure. The very thought of his haughty reserve, his cold, critical eye, was enough to
en_results_raw: space, the same atmosphere, was more than I could endure. The very thought of his haughty reserve, his cold, critical eye, was enough to make my heart sink within me. I had always known that he was a proud man, but I had never realized the full extent of his pride until now, and I must confess that I felt a sense of trepidation at the prospect of encountering him again. I tried to convince myself that I was being foolish, that I had no reason to fear him, but the memory of our last meeting still lingered in my mind, and I could not shake the feeling that he was watching me, waiting for me to make some mistake, some faux pas that would give him the opportunity to despise me even more. And so, I made a point to avoid him, to stay out of his sight, and to hope that he would not notice me, that he would not see me as the awkward, clumsy girl that I felt like in his presence.

En el caso de los personajes de la literatura, como en la vida real, el amor puede ser un sentimiento profundo y auténtico, pero también puede ser una ilusión, una obsesión o incluso una forma de posesión.
